attributes.action: query as to why abandonment is not being looked into in the case of Madeline Mcann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst the parents most be suffering horrifically, I still cannot understand why no action has been taken against them for leaving three toddlers in a hotel room alone in a foreign country.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
